thread.title: Photos: Police, firefighters square off in Guns & Hoses game
thread.title_full: Photos: Police, firefighters square off in Guns & Hoses game

title: Photos: Police, firefighters square off in Guns & Hoses game
text: Photos: Police, firefighters square off in Guns & Hoses game (Photos by Matt Hinshaw/The Daily Courier) Prescott Fire Marshal Don Devendorf pitches the ball Saturday afternoon, Oct. 24. Prescott Police Lieutenant Jon Brambila drives a ball into the outfield Saturday afternoon, Oct. 24, during the Guns & Hoses Softball Classic against the Prescott Fire Department at Ken Lindley Field in downtown Prescott. Benefits from the game and raffle went to Champions for Children Foundation's after school scholarship program.
